name: MTW Series Milling Machine
overview: This MTW series milling machine is designed by our experts, according to collected advices from customers' long-term experiences. It takes the most advanced patent technology from European and the supply the customers with outstanding performance at low costs.
feature: Convenient installation& low dissipation of energy.
High-performance powder concentrator design-accurate and quick selection of powder.
Convenient for maintenance and replacing parts, saving the downtime

application: The MTW series milling machine has wide application in powder making industry of construction, mining and paper-making and so on. It is the ideal machine for grinding barite, limestone, mica, talcum, etc.
